channel.title: Certain People log in walk twice and get logged
channel.description:
I Have people on my server who can play and walk and some people (3 so far) get auto logged after 2 walks someone please help.
Thanks, ElmosWorld

item.title: Certain People log in walk twice and get logged
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

The ppl that get auto logged have windos 7. tell them to right click, edit there run.bat andchange it to

@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx200 Gui 30 0 pause

Read full topic
item.source: Certain People log in walk twice and get logged

item.title: Certain People log in walk twice and get logged
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“ElmosWorld, post:5, topic:386514”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=482271.msg3531939#msg3531939 date=1300240177]
What shows up in your server command prompt when they disconnect, meaning the black window that pops up when you run the server?
[/quote] Gl im Deven disconnected and has his ip[/quote]

Does anything show up in their client command prompt?
